DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety assessment T2380 mydriasis anaesthesia phacoemulsification cataract surgery versus reference group ( topical mydriatic anaesthetic ) 2X246 patient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Assessment Intracameral Injection T2380 Cataract Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: In order perform pupil size measurement ocular discomfort assessment specific time , surgical procedure divide 5 time period accord follow time point : T1 ( first incision ) , T2 ( viscoelastic injection ) , T3 ( capsulorhexis ) , T4 ( intraocular lens injection ) , T5 ( cefuroxime injection ) .
DOC.criteria: Signed date informed consent Male female age 40 88 year old Scheduled undergo unilateral cataract surgery Exclusion criterion : Combined surgery Previous intraocular surgery
